title: Modway Beguile Mid-Century Modern Loveseat with Upholstered, Azure Fabric
features: MID-CENTURY MODERN Loveseat - Boasting a tailored profile and hopeful style, Beguile showcases timeless intrigue and sophistication. Enhance your living room decor with this versatile modern loveseat
LOUNGE SPOT - Make a statement in the living room, den, recreation area, family room or apartment with this inviting modern loveseat with flared arms. Delve deep in both comfort and conversation

INVITING DESIGN - Upholstered in quality polyester, Beguile features padded cushions and button tufting that heighten your space. This modern loveseat is perfect for mid-century and contemporary decor
SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION - Expertly crafted, Beguile sits atop tapered solid wood legs with non-marking caps. Streamlined edges and distinctively flared arms make Beguile a memorable addition
LOVESEAT MEASUREMENTS - Product Dimensions: 36"L x 71.5"W x 34.5"H; Armrest Height from Seat: 4.5"H; Cushion Thickness: 6"H; Weight Capacity: 1323 lbs.
description: Dominate your decor with the expertly designed Beguile Collection. Exquisitely crafted with gently sloping arms, comfortable plush seat cushions, and adeptly tufted back cushion buttons, Beguile is a delightful collection that reinvents mid-century style. Outfitted with a solid wood walnut-stained base and finely upholstered fabric, Beguile comes perfect for living room, lounge and meeting areas.
